languages.text: "Мне не страшно исчезнуть, шерин. Страшно остаться в живых лишь для того, чтобы осознать — все остальные сгинули во тьме. Так что... постарайтесь избежать смертельных ранений".
"I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."
languages.original_text: "Мне не страшно исчезнуть, шерин. Страшно остаться в живых лишь для того, чтобы осознать — все остальные сгинули во тьме. Так что... постарайтесь избежать смертельных ранений".

traits.locale_text: "I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."
"I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."
"I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."
"I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."

languages.text: 「死ぬのは怖くないわ、シャリーン。みんな暗闇に消えてしまった中、ひとり生き残ることのほうがよっぽど怖いの…だから、なるべく致命傷は受けないでね」
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."

traits.locale_text: 「死ぬのは怖くないわ、シャリーン。みんな暗闇に消えてしまった中、ひとり生き残ることのほうがよっぽど怖いの…だから、なるべく致命傷は受けないでね」

languages.text: “我不害怕死亡，亲爱的。我只害怕眼睁睁地看着所有人沉入黑暗的死亡，只有我一个人活了下来……所以，亲爱的，一定要以保命为先。”
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."

traits.locale_text: “我不害怕死亡，亲爱的。我只害怕眼睁睁地看着所有人沉入黑暗的死亡，只有我一个人活了下来……所以，亲爱的，一定要以保命为先。”

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Angst vor dem Tod, Shereen. Ich habe Angst davor, am Leben zu bleiben und dann festzustellen, dass alle anderen in der Dunkelheit umgekommen sind ... Also vermeidet bitte tödliche Wunden."
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Angst vor dem Tod, Shereen. Ich habe Angst davor, am Leben zu bleiben und dann festzustellen, dass alle anderen in der Dunkelheit umgekommen sind ... Also vermeidet bitte tödliche Wunden."

languages.text: «No me da miedo morir, shereen. Me da miedo sobrevivir para darme cuenta de que soy la única que queda con vida en la oscuridad... Así que intente no estirar la pata».
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."

traits.locale_text: «No me da miedo morir, shereen. Me da miedo sobrevivir para darme cuenta de que soy la única que queda con vida en la oscuridad... Así que intente no estirar la pata».

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas peur de mourir, shereen. J'ai peur de survivre et de découvrir que tous les autres ont succombé aux ténèbres... Alors, tâchez d'éviter toute blessure mortelle, je vous prie. »
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas peur de mourir, shereen. J'ai peur de survivre et de découvrir que tous les autres ont succombé aux ténèbres... Alors, tâchez d'éviter toute blessure mortelle, je vous prie. »

languages.text: "Ölmekten korkmuyorum şirinim. Hayatta kalıp diğer herkesin karanlığın içinde yok olduğuna şahit olmaktan korkuyorum. O yüzden lütfen ölümcül şekilde yaralanmaktan kaçınmaya çalış."
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of dying, shereen. I am afraid of staying alive only to discover that everyone else has perished in the darkness... So, do try to avoid any fatal wounds."
